Reviews.Title: great phones
Reviews.Author: Richard M.
Reviews.Content: these phones worked just as advertised, and stayed unlocked after i updated the IOS. Many people attempt to sell jail broken phones, and call them "unlocked", these are the real deal " factory unlocked" phones.

Reviews.Title: Battery life gone
Reviews.Author: Chris Kringle
Reviews.Content: Purchased from Bay shine store, I got the phone and tried it out and after 2 months the batter started to go down I was only getting about 3 to 4 hours standby and 1 to 2 hours of talk time , I don't know why they sent me a phone that was not working  I didnt even use the phone that much because it was for overseas use

Reviews.Title: It is a new iPhone and all functions work!
Reviews.Author: Una E Stewart
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a 'new' iPhone from Amazon.uk which was shipped from Hong Kong. After charging it several times it exploded. Repair shop said water damage and unfixable. So because I loved the elliptical shape of the 3G I crossed finger and tried again. Love the phone.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Roy B.
Reviews.Content: Phone was bought with the express understanding that it was FACTORY unlocked.  That is not the case, and so I am unable to use it all this time.  Further, the battery is as good as dead.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Alexis Darricarrere
Reviews.Content: apple is great! the software si updated, its a great phone. I strongly recommend it, for the price you cant get nothing even close to this

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Masbal97
Reviews.Content: Only one of the speakers works and the phone has a crack on the bottom. The chargers don't even work, their fake...I had to ask for one to be sent. But other than that its okay..

Reviews.Title: (not unlock phone) great Technical assistance
Reviews.Author: Ruben
Reviews.Content: i was unable to uses the phone, , i called apple support center and they found out about this phone was luck by a different carrier, case # 468917332 by apple support center , i want another iPhone, as advertised , will be returned as soon as possible, after all the issue , i would like to tank  deal in the box for all the assistance, once the found the issue , rapidly contacted apple support center and they unlocked the phone, thank you , my recommendations for deal in the box, good customer care thank you guys!

Reviews.Title: is very well
Reviews.Author: Diego Quintero
Reviews.Content: the cell is so good that it got stolen ... on the street when he was receiv a call will run many programs and games

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: sachus
Reviews.Content: This is the mobile i was looking for long time. Its so simple to use and excellent performance. Thnaks to Apple. Its not that much big its so easy to carry and also easy to handle

Reviews.Title: PERFECTION
Reviews.Author: Marco Bauer
Reviews.Content: It's an iPhone, what can I say. though is a 3GS, it has the latest iOS installed. updates everything. Everything works perfect. Only thing is you have no siri or facetime or can't install some games.

Reviews.Title: Great phone at incredible low price
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I stopped using my blackberry and started using this apple phone as my primary cell phone. Phone works well for the price I paid for it. Came unlocked and Updated. I will do business with this vendor again. They have great customer service and will receive referrals from me.

Reviews.Title: i did not haapy with this iphone at all
Reviews.Author: mendon udaya kumar
Reviews.Content: i did not like this at all becoz the battery backup is very bad horible. i was not expecting this form you

Reviews.Title: A couple of functions do not work.
Reviews.Author: Milton Thompson
Reviews.Content: I like the phone it works fine except for a couple of things. when I plug in my earphones only one side works, and my Bluetooth doesn't work. Other phones can find it, but won't connect with it. When it searches for bluetooth devices, even if I'm holding them both it still doesn't find any. It just keeps searching all the time with no results.

Reviews.Title: pesima compra
Reviews.Author: angel
Reviews.Content: Pésima compra Jesús, nunca  mas. me ofertó un celular y me envío otro. decía, Iphone 3gs 16 GB. desbloqueo mundial , mentira. Nota. tener cuidado con ese vendedor. mucha mala fe. no buen vendedor. dolo robo. A usted yo no comprar mas. irresponsable.
